author: Shane Harris, Ellen Nakashima, Michael Birnbaum
title: U.S., European allies announce first wave of sanctions after Russian troops enter eastern Ukraine
description: The White House on Tuesday announced a round of sanctions targeting Russian banks and limiting the country’s access to financial markets after Russia sent troops into two regions of eastern Ukraine, a step U.S. and Europe officials characterized as the openin…
content: If Russia goes further with this invasion, we stand prepared to go further with sanctions, he said, one day after Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered his forces into the two breakaway regions of… [+10263 chars]
